name: Service for Multi Vendor Auction
author: Smart Code Creator

sections.description:
Your auction is in the sidebar of your website.
Freely use the auction site. You will get email if somebody bid your product.

This widget shows the auction products of the wordpress user.
The visitor can navigate between products by buttons.
If the visitor clicks on the picture the auction site opens in another window.

The auction site (Multi Vendor Auction) stores the products of the users(vendors).
The auction site let vendors sell goods or bid on other products after registration or Facebook login.
Using the auction site is absolutely free.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zipped file to your sites /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Widgets tab, and place the new “Service for Multi Vendor Auction” into your sidebar
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the zipped file to your sites /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Widgets tab, and place the new “Service for Multi Vendor Auction” into your sidebar

This is free?

Using the auction site is absolutely free.

Will it increase my WordPress site load?

No, the pictures are served from http://auctionandwebshop.blogbook.hu

(The pictures, auction can be served your web host, server if you bought the Service for Multi Vendor Auction program.)
